name: WIDE AERO SCHOOL OF AVIATION, INC.
about: At WIDE AERO SCHOOL OF AVIATION, INC., we are dedicated to providing top-notch flight training programs tailored for aspiring pilots of all levels. Located in a strategic aviation hub, our school offers a comprehensive range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Instrument, and Commercial licenses. Our experienced and certified instructors, combined with state-of-the-art facilities and advanced simulators, ensure a high-quality learning experience. We welcome both local and international students, providing flexible and affordable training options to fit busy schedules. With a strong focus on real-world scenarios and personalized instruction, we aim to launch successful careers in aviation. Join us to turn your flying dreams into reality.
services:
["Aircraft Maintenance Technology
Aviation Electronics Technology
Airline Operation & Tourism
Sheetmetal Training"]
